long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turkey Run Classic Flash Game: An epic escape journey of a kitchen turkey!

Welcome to "Turkey Run Classic Flash Game"! In this classic Flash game, you will play as a turkey desperately trying to escape from a crazy chef who is hot on your tail.

Key Features:

Thrilling endless running gameplay: In "Turkey Run Classic Flash Game," you need to navigate through various obstacles and traps, constantly running away from the pursuing chef. Jump, slide, and dodge obstacles to maintain the turkey's speed and vitality, striving to escape the clutches of the chef.

Diverse level designs: The game features multiple levels, each with different map layouts and challenges. You will encounter high walls, rolling barrels, splattering oil, and other obstacles that require quick reflexes and finding the best escape route.

Collect power-ups and rewards: During your escape, you can collect various power-ups and rewards such as speed boosters, shields, and life recovery items to enhance your survival abilities and increase your chances of escape. Utilize these items cleverly to evade obstacles and improve your chances of successful escape.

Challenge high scores and share achievements: Escape from the chef's pursuit as far as possible and break the high score record. Share your achievements with friends, compete for the best rankings, and see who is the ultimate runaway turkey!

Are you ready to embark on the epic escape journey of a turkey? Join "Turkey Run Classic Flash Game," push your limits, escape from the chef's chase, and become the king of escape!
